# PostCSS Media Minmax

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/postcss/postcss-media-minmax.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/postcss/postcss-media-minmax) 
[![NPM Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/postcss-media-minmax.svg?style=flat)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/postcss-media-minmax) 
[![NPM Version](http://img.shields.io/npm/v/postcss-media-minmax.svg?style=flat)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/postcss-media-minmax) 
[![License](https://img.shields.io/npm/l/postcss-media-minmax.svg?style=flat)](http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT) 

> å†™ç®€å•ä¼˜é›…çš„ Media Queriesï¼

Media Queries ä¸­çš„ `min-width` å’Œ `max-width` ç­‰å±æ€§éå¸¸å®¹æ˜“æ··æ·†ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡çœ‹åˆ°ä»–ä»¬ï¼Œæˆ‘éƒ½æƒ³å“­ã€‚ç°åœ¨[æ–°çš„è§„èŒƒ](https://drafts.csswg.org/mediaqueries/#mq-range-context)ä¸­ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨æ›´åŠ ç›´è§‚çš„ `>=`æˆ–`<=` æ›¿ä»£ media queries ä¸­çš„ min-/max- å‰ç¼€ã€‚

**V2.1.0 å¼€å§‹æ”¯æŒ `>` æˆ– `<` ç¬¦å·ã€‚**

è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå®ç° [CSS Media Queries Level 4](http://dev.w3.org/csswg/mediaqueries/) Polyfill çš„æ’ä»¶ï¼Œè®©ä½ ç°åœ¨å°±å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨è¿™äº›ç‰¹æ€§ï¼Œå¦ˆå¦ˆå†ä¹Ÿä¸ç”¨æ‹…å¿ƒæˆ‘è®°ä¸ä½äº†ï¼Œé¹…å¦¹å­å˜¤ï¼

## å®‰è£…

    $ npm install postcss-media-minmax

## å¿«é€Ÿå¼€å§‹

ç¤ºä¾‹ 1ï¼š

```js
var fs = require('fs')
var postcss = require('postcss')
var minmax = require('postcss-media-minmax')

var css = fs.readFileSync('input.css', 'utf8')

var output = postcss()
  .use(minmax())
  .process(css)
  .css
  
console.log('\n====>Output CSS:\n', output)  
```

æˆ–è€…åªéœ€ï¼š

```js
var output = postcss(minmax())
  .process(css)
  .css
```

input.cssï¼š

```css
@media screen and (width >= 500px) and (width <= 1200px) {
  .bar {
    display: block;
  }
}
```

ä½ å°†å¾—åˆ°ï¼š

```css
@media screen and (min-width: 500px) and (max-width: 1200px) {
  .bar {
    display: block;
  }
}
```

## CSS è¯­æ³•

### [è¯­æ³•](http://dev.w3.org/csswg/mediaqueries/#mq-syntax)

```
<mf-range> = <mf-name> [ '<' | '>' ]? '='? <mf-value>
           | <mf-value> [ '<' | '>' ]? '='? <mf-name>
           | <mf-value> '<' '='? <mf-name> '<' '='? <mf-value>
           | <mf-value> '>' '='? <mf-name> '>' '='? <mf-value>
```

![syntax](http://gtms03.alicdn.com/tps/i3/TB1Rje0HXXXXXXeXpXXccZJ0FXX-640-290.png)

PostCSS Media Minmax ç›®å‰å¹¶æ²¡æœ‰å®ç° `200px >= width` æˆ–è€… `200px <= width` è¿™æ ·çš„è¯­æ³•ï¼Œå› ä¸ºè¿™æ ·çš„è¯­æ³•å¯è¯»æ€§å¹¶ä¸ä¸æ˜¯å¤ªå¥½ã€‚

## [å–å€¼(Values)](http://dev.w3.org/csswg/mediaqueries/#values)
 
**The special values:**

* [<ratio>](http://dev.w3.org/csswg/mediaqueries/#typedef-ratio)

    <ratio> æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ­£ï¼ˆéé›¶éè´Ÿï¼‰çš„ <integer>ï¼ˆæ•´å‹ï¼‰å–å€¼ï¼Œå…¶åè·Ÿéš0ä¸ªæˆ–å¤šä¸ªç©ºç™½ï¼Œæ¥ç€è·Ÿéšä¸€ä¸ªæ–œçº¿ï¼ˆâ€œ/â€ï¼‰ï¼Œå†è·Ÿéš0ä¸ªæˆ–å¤šä¸ªç©ºç™½ï¼Œæœ€åè·Ÿéšä¸€ä¸ªæ­£<integer>ã€‚

    ```css
    @media screen and (device-aspect-ratio: 16 /   9) {
      /* rules */
    }

    /* equivalent to */
    @media screen and (device-aspect-ratio: 16/9) {
      /* rules */
    }
    ```

* [<mq-boolean>](http://dev.w3.org/csswg/mediaqueries/#typedef-mq-boolean)

    <mq-boolean> å€¼æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª 0 æˆ– 1 çš„ <integer>ï¼ˆæ•´å‹ï¼‰å–å€¼ã€‚å…¶ä»–ä»»ä½•æ•´æ•°æ— æ•ˆã€‚æ³¨æ„ï¼Œ åœ¨ CSS ä¸­ -0 æ€»æ˜¯ç­‰ä»·äº 0 çš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¹Ÿä½œä¸ºä¸€ç§æœ‰æ•ˆçš„ <mq-boolean> å–å€¼ã€‚  

    ```css
    @media screen and (grid: -0) {
      /* rules */
    }

    /* equivalent to */
    @media screen and (grid: 0) {
      /* rules */
    }
    ```

## å¦‚ä½•ä½¿ç”¨

### ç®€å†™

ç¤ºä¾‹ 1ä¸­åŒä¸€ä¸ª Media features name åŒæ—¶å­˜åœ¨ `>=` å’Œ `<=` æ—¶ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç®€å†™ä¸ºï¼š

```css
@media screen and (500px <= width <= 1200px) {
  .bar {
    display: block;
  }
}
/* æˆ–è€… */
@media screen and (1200px >= width >= 500px) {
  .bar {
    display: block;
  }
}
```

éƒ½ä¼šå¾—åˆ°ä¸€æ ·çš„è¾“å‡ºç»“æœï¼š

```css
@media screen and (min-width: 500px) and (max-width: 1200px) {
  .bar {
    display: block;
  }
}
```
**æ³¨æ„**ï¼šå½“ Media features name åœ¨ä¸­é—´çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œä¸€å®šè¦ä¿è¯ä¸¤ä¸ª `<=` æˆ– `>=` çš„æ–¹å‘ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ä¸ä¼šè½¬æ¢ã€‚

ä¾‹å¦‚åœ¨ä¸‹é¢çš„ç¤ºä¾‹ä¸­ï¼Œwidth å¤§äºç­‰äº 500px åŒæ—¶åˆå¤§äºç­‰äº 1200pxï¼Œè¿™åœ¨è¯­æ³•å’Œé€»è¾‘ä¸Šéƒ½æ˜¯é”™è¯¯çš„ã€‚

```css
@media screen and (1200px <= width >= 500px) {
  .bar {
    display: block;
  }
}
```

### æ”¯æŒçš„ Media features name

è§„èŒƒä¸­ç›®å‰ä»¥ä¸‹å±æ€§æ”¯æŒ min-/max å‰ç¼€ï¼ŒPostCSS Media Minmax å…¨éƒ¨æ”¯æŒè‡ªåŠ¨è½¬æ¢ã€‚

* `width`
* `height`
* `device-width`
* `device-height`
* `aspect-ratio`
* `device-aspect-ratio`
* `color`
* `color-index`
* `monochrome`
* `resolution`



### æ”¯æŒåœ¨ `@custom-media` ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨ & Node Watch

```js
var fs = require('fs')
var chokidar = require('chokidar')
var postcss = require('postcss')
var minmax = require('postcss-media-minmax')
var customMedia = require('postcss-custom-media')

var src = 'input.css'

console.info('Watchingâ€¦\nModify the input.css and save.')


chokidar.watch(src, {
  ignored: /[\/\\]\./,
  persistent: true
}).on('all',
  function(event, path, stats) {
    var css = fs.readFileSync(src, 'utf8')
    var output = postcss()
      .use(customMedia())
      .use(minmax())
      .process(css)
      .css;
    fs.writeFileSync('output.css', output)
  })

```


input.css:

```css
@custom-media --foo (width >= 20em) and (width <= 50em);
@custom-media --bar (height >= 300px) and (height <= 600px);

@media (--foo) and (--bar) {
  
}
```

output.css:

```css
@media (min-width: 20em) and (max-width: 50em) and (min-height: 300px) and (max-height: 600px) {
  
}
```

### Grunt

```js
module.exports = function(grunt) {
  grunt.initConfig({
    pkg: grunt.file.readJSON('package.json'),
    postcss: {
      options: {
        processors: [
          require('autoprefixer-core')({ browsers: ['> 0%'] }).postcss, //Other plugin
          require('postcss-media-minmax')(),
        ]
      },
      dist: {
        src: ['src/*.css'],
        dest: 'build/grunt.css'
      }
    }
  });

  grunt.loadNpmTasks('grunt-contrib-uglify');
  grunt.loadNpmTasks('grunt-postcss');

  grunt.registerTask('default', ['postcss']);
}
```

### Gulp

```js
var gulp = require('gulp');
var rename = require('gulp-rename');
var postcss = require('gulp-postcss');
var selector = require('postcss-media-minmax')
var autoprefixer = require('autoprefixer-core')

gulp.task('default', function () {
    var processors = [
        autoprefixer({ browsers: ['> 0%'] }), //Other plugin
        minmax()
    ];
    gulp.src('src/*.css')
        .pipe(postcss(processors))
        .pipe(rename('gulp.css'))
        .pipe(gulp.dest('build'))
});
gulp.watch('src/*.css', ['default']);
```
